channel.title: How do i make it so, after i die, my hp is set back to whatever my hp level is?
channel.description:
When i die, my hp level stays at 0. And i cannot move, or teleport, or eat, or anything.
I want to be able to let people have their hp level back after they die. So if they have 80 hp, after they die, i want them to have 80 hp again. Please help?
Thanks.

item.title: How do i make it so, after i die, my hp is set back to whatever my hp level is?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Set the players levels equal to the level for the xp they have and put that in the applyDeath() method or whatever it is called on your server

Also by base he means a specific name of the server, PI, Delta, Hyperion, ETCâ€¦

All the bases are packaged very differently so it really helps when we know what base you are on

Read full topic
